D D D Distance E E E

Why Distance?

Our mission here at Distance Fitness will always be to arm individuals with the knowledge necessary to live a healthful life and to provide you with the tools that will help you remain motivated to truly go the distance!

— Who We Are —

Dustin Graham

Project Lead

Dustin is the project manager for this project. He was responsible for setting up the Slack, Trello, and GitHub Org. On the first day he ran ice-breakers for everyone to get to know each other, and helped initiate the product vision document to move the project forward. He runs daily stand ups to make sure everyone is staying on task and knows what the goals are that day. On top of being a project manager Dustin is also a student at Lambda School doing what he loves everyday!

Check out more of Dustin's work:

Gunnar Thorson

Web UI Developer

Gunnar is studying Web Development at Lambda school. He lives in Nevada with his wife and one deaf cat.

Devin Graham

Web UI Developer

Devin was behind the design and layout of both the Landing and About pages. He's currently a student at Lambda School, trying to earn the big bucks doing what he loves: Coding! He lives in Northern Mississippi with two dogs he loathes and his wife, who he does not loathe. Check out his other projects:
